--- title: Prepare description: Demo Preparation Page tabs: [ 'Demo preparation', 'Demo script'] --- export const Title = () => Increase straight-through processing to accelerate business responsiveness 300-level demo [BA_STP_300_Prep_GitHub_banner_7-30-21](./images/BA_STP_300_Prep_GitHub_banner_7-30-21.png" width="900") Scenario overview Demo structure Before the demo Key demo considerations How to get support *** ## Scenario overview This demo shows how the IBM Cloud Pak for Business Automation enables straight-through processing. To illustrate this, a customer’s refund process is automated. The capabilities used in this demo are IBM workflow, IBM decisions, and operational intelligence. *** ## Demo structure Introduction 1. Model workflow 2. Execute workflow without straight-through processing 3. Change the workflow for straight-through processing 4. Execute workflow with straight-through processing 5. Monitor operational intelligence 6. Model decisions 7. Reduce manual work Summary *** ## Before the demo ### Requisition instructions Select a delivery option: 1. SaaS using the Cloud Pak for Business Automation as a Service demo environment (likely an IBMer). If you need to request access, follow the instructions here. Your environment is pre-deployed. 2. Install yourself using one of two options:
a. Option 1: Bring your own environment Access the [dba-refund-request](https://github.com/ibm-cloud-architecture/dba-refund-request) GitHub page to read technical architecture information and find deployment instructions. b. Option 2: Reserve on TechZone For IBMers and business partners that have access to TechZone, you can also reserve a Cloud Pak for Automation OpenShift demo environment via the [Straight-through processing TechZone page](https://techzone.ibm.com/collection/5ef5196556dfa7001728cb71#tab-1). Once your environment is ready, continue to the next steps below. *** ## Key demo considerations | **Step 1 prep** | | | :--- | :--- | | **Description** | For step 1, have the Process Designer open to the Refund Request process application. This is a good opportunity to discuss Process Designer features. | | **Actions** | 1 - Access your IBM Cloud Pak for Business Automation as a service tenet here https://demo-emea-02.automationcloud.ibm.com/. Enter your email address.

Note: Steps 1.1, 1.2, and 1.3 are for **technical sellers only**. Most technical sellers initially land in the development environment. If this happens to you, follow these steps to get to the production/runtime environment:
  1.1 - Click on the dropdown menu in the top left corner of the screen.
  1.2 - Click on **Deployment** on the left-hand side, and click on **Production** to switch to that environment.
  1.3 - On the left-hand side click on Run.

2 - Click on **Process Portal**.

3 - Click on **Show more**.

4 - Click on **Focus Corp Demos Dashboard**.

5 - Click on the green **Refund Request** box.

6 - Click on the **Demo Diagram** tab.

7 - Scroll down to display the process diagram. | | **Screenshots** |
